name: react-vite-custom
description: Monorepo with React frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter server build
scripts.clean: pnpm --recursive exec rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: pnpm install && cp -n frontend/.env.example frontend/.env 2>/dev/null || true && cp -n server/.env.example server/.env 2>/dev/null || true
